column6: BBMap uses a multi kmer seed and extend strategy for read mapping.

column9: ContextMap 2: fasta and accurate context-based RNA-seq mapping
column12: Make sure to put the file :file:`jre-8u241-linux-i586.tar.gz` in the same folder as the ContextMap Dockerfile (:guilabel:`src/contextmap2/`).\nYou can get the file here: https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/javase8u211-later-archive-downloads.html

column9: CRAC: an integrated approach to the analysis of RNA-seq reads
DART: a fast and accurate RNA-seq mapper with a partitioning strategy
Fast and SNP-tolerant detection of complex variants and splicing in short reads
Graph-based genome alignment and genotyping with HISAT2 and HISAT-genotype
MapSplice: Accurate mapping of RNA-seq reads for splice junction discovery
Minimap2: pairwise alignment for nucleotide sequences
Fast Mapping of Short Sequences with Mismatches, Insertions and Deletions Using Index Structures
The Subread aligner: fast, accurate and scalable read mapping by seed-and-vote
